main event: The sighting of an unidentified aerial object occurred about 6:15 P.M. on December 6, 1966, in Newman, Georgia. The object was round, about 12 to 15 feet in diameter, with a bright light on top, and hovered silently while changing colors.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 30 minutes by two witnesses,Both witnesses were familiar with aircraft and described the object as unlike anything they knew,The object's hovering ability and color changes were particularly noted,The sighting lasted until the object climbed straight up and disappeared,The weather conditions were clear with good visibility.
sighted object: round object with a bright light on top
witness description: two individuals who were familiar with aircraft
